content: i designed this pattern with free pdf for all sizes thanks to lion brand yarn specifically for those of you who like to knit hats for babies and children to donate to charity this pattern uses bulky weight yarn which means it knits up super fast so you can make more hats more quickly the pattern also includes instructions and ideas to customize and change the basic hat so you can make each one a little different and you won t get bored i also have a list of charities and suggestions for finding a place to donate your hats so we can all help spread the love
